name: vscode-custom-contextmenu
description: Custom Cleaner Contextmenu for Visual Studio Code

custom-contextmenu.vscodeInstallPath.title: VS Code Install Path
custom-contextmenu.vscodeInstallPath.description: Optional override for the VS Code installation directory used to locate workbench.html/workbench.esm.html.

custom-contextmenu.showGoTos.title: Show Go-Tos
custom-contextmenu.showGoTos.description: This option will control: Go to Definition, Go to Type Definition, Go to Implementations, Go to References, Go to Source Definition.

custom-contextmenu.showClipboardItems.title: Show Clipboard Items
custom-contextmenu.showClipboardItems.description: This option will control: Cut, Copy, Paste.
